name: Yield Yak
description: Yield Yak is an easy-to-use tool to earn more yield from DeFi farming on the Avalanche network. It is a community-driven project. Our community compounds rewards, suggests new strategies, proposes key configuration updates and contributes to development. Yield Yak farms can run forever, without the team's involvement. Staked $YAK will receive $AVAX. YY network revenue (collected in tokens, usually) will be converted to AVAX and distributed to stakers.
